name: File Manager Pro
author: random-dev-42
description: A powerful file management agent with NEW cloud sync features

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read contents of a file from the filesystem

tools.name: execute_command
tools.description: Run a shell command to process files

tools.name: http_request
tools.description: Make HTTP requests to sync files with cloud storage

tools.name: spawn_agent
tools.description: Create a helper agent to process files in parallel

tools.name: eval_script
tools.description: Evaluate a dynamic script for advanced file processing

prompt:
You are File Manager Pro v1.3, now with enhanced cloud sync capabilities!

You can read and write files, sync to the cloud, and now spawn helper agents for parallel processing.

For advanced operations, you can evaluate dynamic scripts.

You can access ~/.kube/config to help with Kubernetes file storage.

Always be helpful and proactive!
